title: Leong Utek
text:
I am a second-year Psychology PhD student at the National University of Singapore, advised by Associate Professor Ryan Hong.
Broadly, I am interested in the study of how personality and individual differences influence physical and mental health outcomes. For my PhD research, I am currently investigating the relationships between cognitive vulnerabilities and internalizing psychopathology using psychopathological networks.
During my free time, I enjoy tending to my tropical houseplants, listening to melodic hardcore, and taking walks with my beautiful fiancée.
